definition: to go and return/to return/to resume/to return to a normal or original state/to repeat/again/to recover/to restore/to turn over/to reply/to answer/to reply to a letter/to retaliate/to carry out
variant of 復|复[fu4]/to reply to a letter
surname Yin/abbr. for 印度[Yin4 du4]
to print/to mark/to engrave/a seal/a print/a stamp/a mark/a trace/image
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: His final breakthrough came when he obtained a copy of a manuscript.
sentences.chinese: 贾维斯最终在一份手稿上的复印件上找到了突破口。

sentences.english: We cannot accept copies of online credit card statements.
sentences.chinese: 我们不接受在线信用卡账户电子结单的复印件。

sentences.english: These obligations apply mutatis mutandis to copies and duplicates.
sentences.chinese: 本义务业经必要的修改同样适用于复印件和副本。

sentences.english: Certificate of foreign language proficiency-original and one copy.
sentences.chinese: 外语水平证明原件及复印件。

sentences.english: Copy of Residence record, personal ID and passport.
sentences.chinese: 户口薄和身份证复印件及护照。

sentences.english: ensuring that the photocopies and documents you provide are clear and legible, and
sentences.chinese: 出具的复印件和文件字迹清晰可识。

sentences.english: A copy of Inviters' permanent resident cards.
sentences.chinese: 邀请人的枫叶卡复印件。

sentences.english: Copies of a quota authorization and Import Permit issued by Minister of Commerce.
sentences.chinese: 经贸部签发的进口配额授权和许可证的复印件。
如有，请各附复印件一份。

sentences.english: Enron forwarded a copy of that letter to petitioner .
sentences.chinese: 安然转寄了一份该信函的复印件给上诉人。

sentences.english: If you cannot locate the original, a copy has been included for your convenience.
sentences.chinese: 如果找不到原件，我方已经寄给你方一份复印件。

sentences.english: A certified copy of the birth certificate.
An employee finds a copy of "The Great Gatsby" and begins to read it aloud.
sentences.chinese: 劳方发现的“了不起的盖茨比”复印件，并开始朗读。

sentences.english: Copies of above-mentioned certificates shall be attached.
sentences.chinese: 上述认证证书的复印件应随附。

sentences.english: Copies of documents Party B provides shall be affixed with Party B's official seal.
sentences.chinese: 乙方提供的文件为复印件的，必须加盖乙方公章。

sentences.english: C. Copy of Fax advising shipment according to Clause 13 of this contract.
sentences.chinese: 根据这个合同条目13，电传的发货通知的复印件。

definition: receipt (written acknowledgement of receipt of an item)
